bibl.title: Insights in Diet and Economy of the Eastern Marmarica. Faunal Remains from Greco-Roman Sites in North-western Egypt (Abar el-Kanayis, Wadi Umm el-Asdan and Wadi Qasaba).
bibl.note: 1. The Eastern Marmarica - archaeological and ecological setting. - 2. The faunal remains of Abar el-Kanayis. - 3. The faunal remains of Wadi Umm el-Ashdan. - 4. The faunal remains of Wadi Qasaba. - 5. Comparison with contemporary sites of the region in similar environments. - 6. Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Mitteilungen des Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts. Abteilung Kairo

bibl.seg: Nadja Pöllath & Anna-Katharina Rieger, Insights in Diet and Economy of the Eastern Marmarica. Faunal Remains from Greco-Roman Sites in North-western Egypt (Abar el-Kanayis, Wadi Umm el-Asdan and Wadi Qasaba).
MDIK 67 (2011) pp. 163-207, 22 figg. n./bl. et coul.

1. The Eastern Marmarica - archaeological and ecological setting. - 2. The faunal remains of Abar el-Kanayis. - 3. The faunal remains of Wadi Umm el-Ashdan. - 4. The faunal remains of Wadi Qasaba. - 5. Comparison with contemporary sites of the region in similar environments. - 6. Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
